actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, a 36 mile segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
